select count(1) FROM task_worker tw INNER JOIN work_log wl ON wl.`task_worker_id` = tw.`id` WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) = DATE(wl.create_time) and wl.deleted = FALSE group by wl.task_worker_id

SELECT tw.`day_start_time` AS startTime, tw.`day_end_time` AS endTime, GROUP_CONCAT(wl.id) AS id,wl.task_worker_id as taskWorkerId, group_concat(wl.`from_date`) AS fromDate, group_concat(wl.`to_date`) AS toDate FROM task_worker tw INNER JOIN work_log wl ON wl.`task_worker_id` = tw.`id` WHERE wl.deleted = FALSE and DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE(wl.create_time),'%y-%m-%d') GROUP BY wl.task_worker_id LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
SELECT FROM work_log WHERE task_worker_id = #{taskWorkerId} AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{time},'%Y-%m-%d') and deleted = FALSE

SELECT th.hotel_name AS hotelName,DATE_FORMAT(tw.from_date,'%Y.%m.%d') AS workFromDate,DATE_FORMAT(tw.to_date,'%Y.%m.%d') AS workToDate, DATE_FORMAT(tw.day_start_time,'%H:%i') AS dayStartTime, DATE_FORMAT(tw.day_end_time,'%H:%i') AS dayEndTime,th.task_type_text AS taskTypeText,GROUP_CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(wl.`from_date`,'%H:%i') ORDER BY wl.create_time ASC) AS fromDate, GROUP_CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(wl.`to_date`,'%H:%i') ORDER BY wl.create_time ASC) AS toDate, th.`hotel_id` AS hotelId,tw.id AS taskWorkerId,tw.worker_id AS workerId, DATE_FORMAT(wl.`create_time`,'%Y/%m/%d') AS current FROM ( SELECT m.`create_time`,m.`from_date`,m.`to_date`,m.`task_worker_id` FROM work_log m LEFT JOIN (SELECT create_time FROM work_log WHERE to_date IS NULL AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) >= DATE(create_time)) m3 ON DATE(m.`create_time`) = DATE(m3.create_time) ) wl INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM task_worker WHERE worker_id = #{workerId}) tw ON wl.`task_worker_id` = tw.id INNER JOIN task_hr_company th ON th.id = tw.task_hr_id GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(wl.create_time,'%Y.%m.%d')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(tw.from_date,'%Y.%m.%d') AS workFromDate,DATE_FORMAT(tw.to_date,'%Y.%m.%d') AS workToDate, DATE_FORMAT(tw.day_start_time,'%H:%i') AS dayStartTime,DATE_FORMAT(wl.`from_date`,'%H:%i') AS fromDate, DATE_FORMAT(wl.`to_date`,'%H:%i') AS toDate,DATE_FORMAT(wl.`create_time`,'%Y/%m/%d') AS current, DATE_FORMAT(tw.day_end_time,'%H:%i') AS dayEndTime,tw.hourly_pay AS hourlyPay, th.task_type_text AS taskTypeText, th.`task_content` AS taskContent, c.name AS hotelName, c.address AS address,c.leader AS leader,c.leader_mobile AS leaderMobile,th.`hotel_id` AS hotelId,tw.id AS taskWorkerId FROM (SELECT * FROM work_log WHERE task_worker_id = #{taskWorkerId} AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y/%m/%d') = #{date}) wl INNER JOIN task_worker tw ON wl.`task_worker_id` = tw.id INNER JOIN task_hr_company th ON th.`id` = tw.task_hr_id INNER JOIN company c ON c.id = th.`hotel_id`

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(m.from_date, '%H:%i') ORDER BY m.create_time ASC ) AS fromDate, GROUP_CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT( m.to_date, '%H:%i') ORDER BY m.create_time ASC ) AS toDate, GROUP_CONCAT( IFNULL(m.STATUS, 0 ) ) AS STATUS, GROUP_CONCAT( IFNULL( m.employer_confirm_status, 0 ) ) AS employerConfirmStatus, m.create_time AS createTime FROM ( SELECT from_date, to_date,STATUS ,employer_confirm_status,create_time,id FROM work_log WHERE task_worker_id = #{taskWorkerId} ) m GROUP BY m.create_time
select from_date,to_date,status,employer_confirm_status from work_log where task_worker_id = #{taskWorkerId} order by create_time ASC
